attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent revelations of the failures of goverment we the public feel that the current goverment has no longer the authority govern. The public should now have the opportunity to give voice to this opinion. An election should be called now, not at the chosing of our unelected prime minister but now, at the call of the public. It matters not that the current political parties have time to prepare. It is in essence a vote of no confidence in the present regime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
